mapper.sql: template_id, car_model_id, title, bg_pic_url, module_ids, status, acquiesce

template_id,
car_model_id,
title,

module_ids,
status,
acquiesce,

mapper.update:
update car_model_template
car_model_id = #{carModelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bg_pic_url = #{bgPicUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
module_ids = #{moduleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
acquiesce = #{acquiesce,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from car_model_template where status = 1 and car_model_id = #{carModelId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by acquiesce DESC ,1 DESC limit 1
